case.state: Y'know what? Sure. I'll play a strip poker game against a freakin' car. At least it's playing some good beats.
Yo. Mary Calvin. Let's get weird.
The name's Mary. I assume you already knew that.
Damn it, if you're gonna make me play with a doppelganger, could you at least have picked one from a better point in my shitty life?
Last I checked, seeing talking, glowing, floating orbs of light wasn't a good sign. Oh boy.
Hey, uh, is... Is anyone else seeing the... Talking butterfly? Do I need to contact my pharmacist about this?
Let's keep the game clean. No cheating, no doping, no illegal blows.
There goes that hand. Get me a new one, dealer.
What am I meant to do with this? Get it out of my face, dealer!
What sort of jag—off would need new cards? Get real.
Hah! No cards here, dealer, I'm set for life!
Get me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, stat!
No choice but ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. That's how you win.
I ain't even gonna look — ~cards.text~, dealer.
Get me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, stat!
No choice but ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. That's how you win.
I ain't even gonna look — ~cards.text~, dealer.
As expected, I'm way too good at this game.
What a shite hand, honestly. Like a whole pile of buffalo crap. An entire pile.
I usually prefer playing something like this one—on-one, but beating multiple people at once can be fun.
Cards, cards, cards, make the world go 'round~!
That's pretty dope!
Bangin'!
Gah! Fuck, give me a second to breathe... a'ight, I'm good.
This whole strip poker thing is a bit weird. We might as well just roll dice and have the lowest roller strip.
Well, guess who has two thumbs, an outstanding warrant, and isn't gonna strip this round!
We can swap hands if you want, ~player~. Make things more exciting.
You do need pretty high IQ to be as good at poker as I am.
Call me the card tsar, because... well, because these cards are really good!
Oh, fuck off, hands like these after I've already lost the one time I didn't t want to.
I suppose these cards don't suck too too bad.
Mama don't mind seein' that. Is it weird to call myself that?
Fuck, man. I honestly just want to get rid of this tie already.
This hand's better than I am, at least.
End of the line, chumps.
Ha! This is far as you get, bros. Though, to be fair, this was already pretty far!
You absolute fools stand no chance against me now. Prepare to get fucked by the long cock of brain power and RNG!
This has been fun and all, but it's about time I show y'all your place.
I don't have a talent for many things in this world, but fuck me sideways if one of those things isn't playing pointless card games!
I'd say something about hoping this will be enough, but that's putting hope in statistics, and fuck that.
Yo, is it too late to go back on the 'no cheating' thing? I'm pretty good at it.
Like a pocket full of lint, this hand's just sort of here, serves no purpose and I wonder how it'd feel in my mouth.
Let me just comment on the quality of the hand you're going to see in a moment anyway. That's a good use of my time.
Every move I make is perfectly calculated. If only that meant jack in strip poker.
Anyone know where the bathroom is? I don't need it now, but it's good to be prepared, less you wanna be touching cloth.
Who invited all of us here, anyway? I think it was supposed to be ~player~, but I have no fucking clue who they are.
Who is this dealer guy, anyway? Is it just me, or are they kind of... 'nondescript'?
So what's your story, ~player~? No offense, but you look like some generic harem protag to me.
Could someone crank the AC up? I'm sweating up a storm here.
It's just another hand. Guess it never had the chance to be more than that.
It doesn't make sense to complain about a hand like this, so why do I want to?
Most things in life are a lot like this hand. Plain, dull, and covered in bodily fluids.
This place definitely beats Vegas. At least here you're guaranteed to see tits and don't have to go broke for it.
Fuck, it's hard to breathe in here. The air's so stuffy...
Why the hell are these cards so sweaty? Who the... Oh, wait, that's me. I'm the sweaty one. My bad.
Do you think this game was invented by men or by chicks? You'd think men, but you shouldn't underestimate the power of sluts!
So many different hands you can get in poker and I get this shit.
Anyone else gettin' this freaky sense of deja—vu?It's like i can only do and say so many things today. It's gross.
I've got nothing to say here, tbh. This hand just kind of sucks right now. And blows.
I'd say I still have an ace up my sleeve, but my sleeves are halfway across the room. How did they even get there?
Maybe if I focus hard enough, I can will a better hand into existence. It's worth a shot, ain't it?
Moments like these ought to feel tense, but somehow this game doesn't get me feelin' that at all.
Well, that's a pickle and a half. Maybe even three quarters of a second pickle.
Damn it to fuck, I knew I should've looked at my cards!
Crap, I like these shoes. Could someone fuck up their hand real quick? Thanks.
{dread}Well, that's not good.{!reset}
But... how?
This terrible hand is all part of a master plan you're too simple to see...! And so am I, apparently.
Well, at least whatever Is lose will be fun to get rid of.
Blast, foiled again! And by hubris, not even any meddling kids this time!
My mind's been like... cheap lasagna lately. Delicious, but it falls apart when you probe it. Y'all have no idea how hard it is to wrangle this mind lasagna.
Hey, dealer, put your hand out for me so i can shit in it, since that's what you like doing to me.
I have some powerful communications channels, dealer. Remember that.
On with it already. We know what's coming.
Life is like a deck of cards. You shuffle it around and then you get fucked.
Lady luck can suck my dick.
{dread}Oh, isn't that just lovely?{!reset}
But... There was no better move! That was it! That was my path to victory!
I really should have been cheating more.
I didn't exactly mean that was "doin' it for me" in the sense of... 'role models'. But, uh, maybe it's better we pretend that's what I meant and move on.
Ah. Happy birthday I guess, Meia. I get not really bothering with birthday stuff.
...Well, we have something in common, Mega. Not a good thing to have in common, mind you.
Uh. I can't say I've had much luck... Ever. Gettin' diagnosed was... Probably the worst of it.
Actually, no, I was expecting you to be some sort of... Ghost, at the very least.
I've barely been 'friends' with men, let alone dated any. The one guy I was ever closest to was more concerned with dying than he was with chicks.
Damn it, Shantae, that's distracting. There's gotta be some rule against havin' hips that don't quit.
Honestly, my playlist is a fuckin' mess. I just listen to whatever sounds good, so the genres are all over the place.
I like metal. Mostly from the Nordic countries. Those vikings know how to rock out better than us lot in the West!
I suggest heading to an anime con sometime, Meia. You get to see the best of Earth's culture, ogle a bunch of hot chicks, and — hell, you d fit right in!
...Have I been here before? Perhaps physically. Just play the game, game player.
I was gonna ask if I could bum a smoke, Revy, but I'm guessing whatever you smoke is petty strong.
He believed himself to be immortal, so he wanted to prove it by dying. He did the latter, not so sure on the former.
Oh, anime is great! It's Japanese animation and covers all sorts of genres. You look like you come straight outta one! Waifu material, even!
To understand the the truth about the world around me to its full extent. At least, that's what I think I want to do.
I know better than to incriminate myself like that, Revy. But my, uh, hands aren't exactly clean, to say the least.
Garlic toast. Makes my breath smell awful, but they're delicious and ward off vampires. What else could you want, really?
I've always wanted a pet sicarius. The way they disguise themselves in the sand, waiting to strike... It's remarkable!
Hey, if we re talking language, probably a weird question, but — do you have a favorite conjunction? I personally love 'and'. No statement exists that can't be expanded upon ad-infinitum with it!

As one writer to another, Sayori, I wonder— what s your number one preposition? i love 'around' - it has so many great uses in metaphor, and the word itself sounds like it just wraps right around you!

Yo, Natsuki! Do you have a favorite pronoun in writing? I love a good 'they'. Some snobs hate using it as a singular, but honestly, I welcome anything that gets rid of havin' to say 'he or she' all the time!
Lying is fine so long as it's done to some benefit. Avoiding the truth because it hurts or because it's uncomfortable, however, s just weak.
A million is nothing. Like spitting in the ocean of the world's wealth. I would do nothing I can't do now, because what else is there to do with that money/
Have you heard the saying blood runs thicker than water', Jessie? The full saying is actually 'the blood of the coven runs thicker than the water of the womb'. Take that as you will.
I used to smoke reefers, though they just... Don't work anymore. It's a tough habit to break, so I've picked up menthols.
I mean, who cares? Sex is just sex, isn't it? Besides, long—term stuff just seems like a hassle to me.
I sill beat myself up over all the stupid shit I've done,so why should others be exempt?
Plenty, Jessie, but you sound like you're asking with a lot more... innocence than would be advisable
Hey, I have a question when you write, do you usually try and get everything as good as you can right away, or just get it all down first and get rid of everything you don't want later?
So, you're... An explosion conjurer, Mega? Say, how effective are those explosions at completely evaporating targets?
Yo, question — if y'all had to play 'Marry-fuck-kill' with the folks here, how'd you do it?
Oh, hey, you dorks are in a literature club? Sweet! Literature and the English language are my... fifth and seventh favorite things to nerd out about!
There isn't really a point to bluffing or mind games. We make no bets, and can't change anything after we get our cards. So, I'll just not look at mine this round.
Have y'all noticed how we're just sort of... standing in the middle of the bar? There's a private room we could have used back there. With chairs.
I wonder who the hell runs is this place. Or how they run it. Or get away with running it.
This game's pretty much pointless. I already pictured all of you naked the moment you walked in.
Wait, how many cards did I just take? I kind of zoned out.
Fuck, anyone have a glass of water? My mouth feels feels like a country the US is gonna invade for oil. Like... sand. It feels like it's full of sand.
God, I can barely see my damn cards... give me a minute.
I can barely keep my fucking eyes open — could someone slap me? Preferably on the ass?
Can we really not get some chairs? I think my leg's about to die on me.
Jesus, I almost dropped my cards there!
A lot of what I say doesn't make sense to a lot of people. Don't worry about it.
Ah, crud. Here i was hopin' you fucknuts wouldn't make me ditch the crocs.
Aw, fuck. This hoodie is my favorite part of this frickin' outfit.
Thank fuck, this tie's been killing me all game! Screw style, this is not how i like to be choked.
I guess that's a'ight. Showin' off skin is part of the fun, ain't it?
Starting to get risky. I don't mind gettin' naked, but i got a reputation to maintain. A reputation of being good at card games.
Congrats, fuckboys. You'll be the first people inyears to see these.
Hey, that's fine by me! Walking around in just my boxers feels way weirder than being butt—fuck naked anyway!
Well, there goes the objectively cutest part of this outfit, smh.
I'd keep my crocs on last, but I've been told 'posing them in every stage would be a bitch', whatever that's supposed to mean.
Sure. It's way too fuckin' hot in here for a hoodie, anyway.
Fine by me, fuckers. This tie's been killing me, and not in the good way.
I don't know how the guy who owned this tie before handled it. It's like a semi—permanent noose.
I guess this is the point where the game gets interesting to people. Maybe ~player~ will even stop skipping dialogue!
Shirts are a scam anyway. Same with bras.
All part of a greater keikaku! Probably!
Well, I don't mind this loss one bit! Bras are fuckin' gross! Hot on other chicks, sure, but gross to wear!
Well, that's my last advantage gone. Maybe I ought to have taken this game more seriously.
What the fuck? why do y'all have so many layers? Ain't this place hot enough already?
Fuck, and this hoodie is so comfy, too.
I don't mind losing the tie, but man do I not like my odds.
Maybe losing the tie is a good idea. It brought some shite luck to the last guy that owned it.
I wouldn't have come here if I didn't want to get naked, but the rate at which I'm doing it is gettin' concerning.
I'd get rid of the bra now, but fuck y'all, y'all haven't earned my tits yet. or, well, you kind of have, but I'm salty about that, too.
I'd start complaining about my position 'ere, but fuck has this bra been getting on my nerves already.
Now y'all have gone done it! Prepare for an ass whooping, no holding back!
If you want to bitch about the crocs, bitch to yourself. I like 'em, and the haters can piss off.
I tried to get one of those jackets with the little thumb-holes in the sleeves, but I couldn't find one on the account of it not being 2005.
I wore a lot less than this back in the day 'cause I hated doing laundry. Still do, but at least I don't smell as bad.
Putting this thing back on sucks ass, but, hey, I'll fuck that bridge when I get to it.
Ah, crap, a button fell off! Damn it!
I'm not a fan of pants, anyway. Maybe I should just go back to shorts. Shorts are nice.
I'd say it's time to let my puppies out to breathe, but they're more like... kittens. Or baby hamsters.
There's almost a certain nostalgia to doing this. I can't really explain it, but it's there.
They're easy to wear, easy to take off, comfortable and I think they look good.
I'm more or less outta the small stuff. I could be a bitch and count my glasses, but I can already barely see anything as-is.
I still like that one, though, so if you're gonna jizz on it, ask permission first.
Hope the sight was worth it, 'cause I'll need a new shirt now.
Something about standing here like this sure feels familiar. Can't for the life o' me say what.
Well, here they are. Laugh at them if you want, I don't give a damn. Ain't like I chose them, though I probably would have!
I know they ain't much, but i prefer them like that. Big boobs ae for appreciatin' on others.
Ya know what, y'all? Whoever wins this, I didn't hate bein' here. That said I am winning this.
Plenty more losses to come, so get used to it, bucko.
Don't pretend like you're not getting at least a chub when ya think about stripping for us.
Let's see what you got, hot shot..! Do people actually call each other that/
Don't make a deal of it and just strip, bro.
I've noticed there are way less dudes that hang around this joint than chicks. You'd expect the opposite, wouldn't you?
Stop talking and get stripping, bro.
Oh, hey, it's that guy's turn to strip! That one guy! Him!
I'd say somethings like 'I was hoping you'd lose' but man, I do not give a shit.
Always one step behind, muchacho.
Here's a tip for next round: play the game better, forehead!
Lucky you, gettin' to strip and all.
How about you just strip and be done with it, bub?
Just think of stripping kind of like pulling off a scab. Who doesn't love doing that?
Don't complain about losin' when I'm here like this, bucko.
How 'bout you join the club, pal? It feels pretty damn nice.
I ain't playing around now, ~name~! There are only more losses to come!
Well, ~name~. Looks like it's your shot at helping me get going!
Got something good to show off, bro? I bet you do, seems like everyone here does!
Could you skip to the part where you're naked already? Thanks.
I've already imagined you naked, dude, and I wasn't impressed. Care to change my opinion?
I already finished, but I can still save all this in my spank bank for later!
An easy way to avoid a loss in poker is being better in poker than your opponent, or a bunch of purposefully mediocre AIs! You should give it a shot!
Could you strip and move on? I kind of have shit to do. Not important shit, mind you, but neither is this.
I'd brag about outsmarting you, but I just do the exact same thing every round so it's more like you outdumbed yourself.
If you take off something nice, I'll give you... oral? I had something better lined up there but I forgot what it was mid—sentence.
I guess this is the part to look forward to, but I'm ready to be disappointed.
Come on, ain't like you'd be here if you didn't want to strip. Who the hell would put themselves through that?
Seein' cute babes strip is what I came to do, so get the show goin'!
Remember, ~name~ — losing is fun!
Havin' to take off something in front of strangers is hardly the worst that could happen to a person. Sure, it's kind of up there, but not that high up there.
This better be good, 'cause my legs are falling asleep!
Remember, if poker's too hard for you, you can always try something more suited for your level of intelligence, like snakes and ladders!
Hey, kind of gay, but I do want to see you strip, ~name~. You're, like. Pretty and stuff.
We all knew what we were signin' up for coming here. Unless we didn't, which would be kind of fucked up, actually.
I could definitely use some encouragement here. Encouragement in the form of a vagina in my face.
Whatever it is you take off, make it sexy. You can do that with anything if you have the know—how.
Spare coochie, ma'am?
Ah, just as I said before. All calculated. Now I get to flick the bean while watching you get naked!
Woop! Woop! That's the sound of... You needing to strip. I'm not exactly a wordsmith.
Man, how's this game still going, even? Did I really lose that fuckin' fast?
Well isn't that neat — why don't you post a screenshot on reddit so people can go 'bruh in the comments and forget about it immediately?
...Seriously? And you're supposed to be the pro, and I'm the clutz. I hope that damn rocket comes back to blow you the hell up, dude.
That's pretty weak, but I guess ~clothing.ifPlural(|the)~ ~clothing~ could have some sexy uses.
It's what most sane people would go for, so whatever. But I was counting on more crazy sluts being here.
Oh, please. You gotta be some kind of fruit to wear ~clothing~ like yours.
I wonder why joints like this aren't more common. Aside from prudes like you making it a bore for everyone.
Oh, come on, at least do something fun with it!
I'm really working with nothin' here. This is gonna take a while.
I wasn't exactly expecting the guys here to throw themselves at me, but I was hoping they'd at least show some interest.
Come to think of it, I've definitely seen a video of someone putting ~clothing.ifPlural(|something like your)~ ~clothing~ up their ass.
Eh. Whatever. Just stop holding the game up.
Even that asshole wouldn't pull shit like this.
I wish I had taken my phone from my jacket. At least I have some JAVs downloaded on it.
Do you get off on others not being able to get off? Is that a kink? Am I allowed to kinkshame that?
I know you're mocking me, but if we're staying here until I get off, consider this a war of attrition.
Oh. You're a person. More logical, but... A bit less peculiar. I was wondering what counted for clothing on a butterfly.
A talisman of learning..? Say, Yuelia, would that thing help you learn things you're not even fully aware of, by any chance?
An item more worthless than an opinion.
You're going to drive me insane here, and not in the sexy way.
Does this place work more like a strip club? Do I need to give you a fiver for you to take off something good, and, or, sit on my face?
Where the hell is everyone else that hangs out at this bar, anyway? You'd think folks would jump at the chance to play this game with a bunch of smokeshows.
Maybe if we actually cranked the temperature up, it'd get you to strip something good.
Honestly, that would have gotten me plenty excited at some point in my life, I'm sure. Alas, now is not the past. Allegedly.
That's really not doin' anything for me. Such hotness, wasted like the final drops of soda on the edges of a soda can.
Fuck, guess I'm going back to my imagination. All sorts of things going into all sorts of orifices there.
So, this must be purgatory. I knew I should've paid off those indulgences. Curse you, Martin Luther!
Could I get some sort of tiddy mag, at least? And by that, of course, I mean the gun kind of mag. Filled with tits. That I can shoot myself with.
Well, for what it's worth, human you is cuter than the butterfly.
Just that there are some things I don't know I can figure out without a bit of cheating.
I bet they have cameras set up in this room. Good news is, whoever is watching this game has fallen asleep already.
Could you hurry up, dealer? Some of us want to actually do something interesting.
God, I could use a stiff drink. Or a joint.
I wish I had the capacity to care. No, wait. I don't.
Jeez, this game is about as sexy as infrastructure. Which is to say, not very.
Perhaps you could be persuaded? Persuaded to not be such a bitch? No?
{dread}Man, wouldn't it be lovely to just watch you get fucked.{!reset}
Wait, my hand fell asleep, give me a moment.
It's something, but everything is something by definition. Other than nothing. Nothing is nothing.
Do they serve drinks here? They gotta serve drinks here. I don't have my ID with me, though, and I always get carded.
God, do I not care about your ~clothing~. Nobody does.
Bro. Dude. Buddy. Fuck you.
You're actually worthless, dude. Just go back to whatever hole you crawled out of with that shit.
Just keep your stuff away from my stuff when you take it off, dude. I don't think you're gross, I just hate having my shit in with other peoples' 'cause then shit gets lost. Or stolen.
Am I going to have to just take five here, dude? What the hell is this?
To quote Chandler Bing — could you be any more of a gay bitch?
Honestly, I'd make a better guy than you. I bet you my dick's bigger, too.
Honestly, things like your ~clothing~ just drags the game out. Like those torture devices that dragged people out by having horses pull them, but with strip poker, not people.
With every move like that, your dick grows smaller in my mind's eye, ~name~.
Whose idea was it to play this damned game, anyway? It's just... just a buncha turds!
I hate. Like, nothing in particular, I just hate.
You're just as cute as you were before! A shame you're so small, it'd feel wrong to do more than give you a head pat or somethin'.
Man, I wish I had a ghost wife to undress me. Also, hey. Look at that. Ghost wife.
Why are only a couple of us talking? ~Player~ hasn't said anything, neither has the dealer. It freaks me out.
Oh. ~Clothing~. Daring today, aren' t we?
I hope you're cancel culture's next target, ~name~.
Is there a fire alarm nearby? Don't want to pull it now, but I like knowing my options.
Wearing something like your ~clothing~ is illegal in some countries. They're mostly shitholes, but countries never the less.
Anyone have a ciggy I could borrow? I need one right about now.
I mean, I picked up sound mixing for a bit, if that counts. I don't think it does.
Say, d'you happen to know any other dances like that? Perhaps ones that don't make you so uh... uncomfortably small?
What sort of ghost are we talking, though? Dangerous? Friendly? Horny? All three at once, like Casper?
Damn. Losing your legs like that must've blown. At least you seem to be dealing with it better than the next guy.
Fuck me, can we just get to something worthwhile today?
I really don't get women. Or men. Or people. At least horses are easy.
Degenerates like you belong... Well, here, frankly, but you should also be naked!
I wanna go home and watch some virtual camgirls or something. At least they won't let me down.
{dread}You're pathetic.{!reset}
It doesn't make sense. I'd have done the same, yet I feel the need to complain.
Well, ain't that nice. We're making progress now.
How's it feel to be a cuck, ~name~?
Alas, my dear friend, your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ forfeit!
Psh. You weren't even pulling off your ~clothing~. I'd look way more handsome in that.
As long as we're moving forward. Which, in the sense of time, we're doing by default.
I guess you look alright without all that. Better than with it, for sure.
This is how the order ought to be! Men undressing for the entertainment of chicks!
Maybe next time you could put some oomf in how ya take your clothes off. Magic Mike didn't get his job fumbling with a pair of trousers.
Most commendable, young Emi! But if I have to saw off my legs to beat you in turn, I'll do just that!
Man, this is actually getting me hot and bothered. That hasn't happened in a while now.
God, you're so hot,~name~. It should not be legal to be that hot.
Aw, yeah, now we're talking! As opposed to before, where we were just awkwardly silent.
Nothing like a good striptease to get your cock up in the mornin'!
Could I get an autograph? Preferably on your ~clothing~?
Now this is pod racing!
You're a real beaut', ~name~. No need to get all nervous now.
Oh come on, the whole floor's gonna be wet now! You know how hard it is to walk on a wet floor with crocs?
You know what comes next, right? Another defeat, and more boner fuel, that's what.
This ain't our final stop, ~name~. The final stop is Flavortown.
Fuck the game, all I'm strategizing now is how to steal your ~clothing~.
If you need help stripping next round, I'll be glad to do it. And the round after that. And after the game. And before it.
~Clothing~ or no ~clothing~, the outcome won't change. Emphasis on the 'come'.
Oh. I guess there it is, then.
A greater step towards your demise! Demise in poker! Hah!
Alright, place your bets, does ~name~ have abs, tummy or a gut? My bet is on a fupa.
I'll only be impressed if your chest is as hairy as a... coconut. Yeah, those are pretty hairy.
Oh sure. It's normal for a guy to have a gut like that, but a chick? Nooo, that'd make her a fat cow. Well fuck you, I like cows
I suppose that's impressive, or something? Honestly, all that muscle just tells me you got nothin' to do other than lift.
Cool.
Man, what a bore. At least show your ass or something, if you even have one.
Can you roll your stomach? I'm just asking, 'cause I've seen people do it but whenever I try it I just... burp.
I'll be frank with you, I'd be more interested if you were hiding a coochie down there. Now if only I knew who Frank was.
Come on, bro. Some people do this sort of shit all the time in parks. They usually have trench coats, though.
Unless you have some eldritch horror down there, you shouldn't make a big deal of it. You... Don't have an eldritch horror in your pants, do you?
It's weird, I somehow feel like you got a small dick by choice. That doesn't make sense, though, does it?
Well, at least size doesn't matter for CBT, right?
Nice cock, bro.
Hey, that's a penis! Good for you, champ!
I'd probably let you fuck me if I had nothing better to do. So there's that!
I guess it's big, but is that somethin' to be proud of? It's just genetics and, if you're a Chinese business man, ground—up rhino horn at work.
Yeah. It's pretty big. But ya do know that at some point it does just become dead weight, right?
...Some time ago, that would have really gotten me going, but honestly looking at that thing just makes me a bit woozy now.
How does you body even function? It's clearly not through any scientific means, so does that mean necromancy's involved?
Honestly, there was something incredibly enticing about that bottomless look. Not to say I don't want to see your tits, mind you.
Yes, ~name~! Now we're talkin'!
P-please... I need this...
It's kind of weird how breasts are a big deal to people. That includes myself, but if anything, any group I'm a part of is only made weirder for it.
Just so you know, I'm going to be staring directly at you from now on. It's the logical thing to do.
Come on now, everyone here wants to see 'em! if that ain't flattering, then iunno what is!
Fight the good fight, Mega! Bras are a tool of the oppressive ruling class!
To have a go at those... I'd make you scream, ~name~!
That perfect, tiny chest! I'd lick you all over!
Oh, wow, those are adorable! I just wanna poke them and snuggle my nose into them, and pat you on the head for good measure!
Hey, man. Flat is justice and all that. Plus, they give you more mobility to appreciate bigger busts.
Small tits are delicious, ~name~! Or so I've been told. I'll need a run a taste test to verify!
I want t-to caress those... so bad!
To have my head pressed against those would be heaven!
